WorkItem.ClosedComment:
it's not an issue

p.s. use SQLiteSpy or MainMap.Manager.OptimizeMapDb()
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I'm trying to prefetch one area to use it offline in a Win CE device, so I open the "Great Maps for Windows Forms" select the area and click on prefetch but I'm having some issues:

1) The file (Data.gmdb) already comes with 32 mb and even if I delete it when I open the "Great Maps for Windows Forms" it is recreated by default with the same size, since I'm using a Win CE device I needed it to be small, is there any other way of doing it?
2) Can I prefetch one polygon (attached "Lima Area.png") instead of a selected square area?
3) If "2" is not possible can I prefetch multiple areas in one file?

Thank you very much.
